Notification.Template: A Directive to Apprehend #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been witnessed by #{pd.contact.officer.OfficerProfile.firstName} #{pd.contact.officer.OfficerProfile.lastName} and was file stamped #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.dateOfIssueString}. Please acknowledge this notice upon his arrival to your office.

A Juvenile Directive to Apprehend #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} is now ready and needs to be activated.
The Directive to Apprehend was file stamped on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.fileStampDateString} and acknowledged on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantAcknowledgementDateString}.

#{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} is wanted pursuant to a Directive to Apprehend #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum}.
If located contact Juvenile Probation Intake at 713-222-4100.

A Probable Cause Warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been issued for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}.
If juvenile is located, please contact the Juvenile Probation Intake at 713-222-4100.

The Order of Immediate Custody #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} has been initiated as of #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.dateOfIssueString} and is ready to be signed.

#{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} is wanted pursuant to an Order of Immediate Custody on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.Charge.petitionNum} issued by #{pd.juvenilewarrant.Charge.courtId}th District Court on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.dateOfIssueString}.
If the youth is located, contact the Harris County Juvenile Probation Department at (713) 222-4100.

The #{pd.juvenilewarrant.Charge.courtId}th District Court has decided that the Order of Immediate Custody #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} will not be issued until the following updates have been completed.
#{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.unsendNotSignedReason}
The #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantOriginatorCourt}th District Court has decided that the Order of Immediate Custody #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} will not be issued.

A Violation of Probation warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} is now ready and needs to be activated.
The Violation of Probation warrant was created on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.dateOfIssueString} for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}, juvenile number #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.juvenileNum}. Please review VOP documents for activation.

The Violation of Probation warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been activated on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantActivationDate} for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}, juvenile number #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.juvenileNum}.

The Violation of Probation warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been returned for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}, juvenile number #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.juvenileNum} because #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.unsendNotSignedReason}.

The Violation of Probation warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been rejected for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}, juvenile number #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.juvenileNum} because #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.unsendNotSignedReason}.
The Arrest Warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} for juvenile #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} needs to be activated.

The juvenile #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} is wanted on Arrest Warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum}.
Contact the Juvenile Probation Department at 713-512-4000 for processing information if apprehended.

The #{pd.codetable.Code.description} warrant issued on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.dateOfIssueString} for #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} has been recalled because #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.recallReasonDescription}.

The #{pd.codetable.Code.description} warrant, #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been executed by #{messaging.contact.user.to.UserBean.firstName} #{messaging.contact.user.to.UserBean.lastName}, #{messaging.contact.user.to.UserBean.departmentName}, #{pd.contact.officer.OfficerProfile.officerPhoneNumbers}, regarding juvenile #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix}. The juvenile was apprehended on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.arrestTimeStampString}.
The juvenile Warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} is ready to be filed.

After reviewing the information of #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} it has been determined that the juvenile can be brought to the Juvenile Detention Center at 1200 Congress, Houston, Texas. Please enter the details documenting the release to Juvenile Probation.

After reviewing the information of #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.nameFirstMiddleLastSuffix} on #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} it has been determined that the juvenile can be released to a parent or guardian. Please enter the details documenting the release to person details.
#{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} associated with the following address:
Juvenile Warrant #{pd.juvenilewarrant.JuvenileWarrant.warrantNum} has been created.
